notes: US-050: Causal direction from temporal asymmetry in TB partitions. Tests forward-reverse coupling asymmetry and time-lagged cross-covariance on a synthetic causal chain (X1->X2->X3) and the LunarLander 8D state space. Granger causality baseline comparison included. Forward-reverse asymmetry is the primary TB-based causal signal; time-lagged state cross-covariance provides a complementary temporal signal.
